snippet: Ben Ainslie’s altercation in December with a media motorboat driver and a cameraman has brought into focus sailors’ difficulty in adapting to increased television coverage.
abstract: British champion sailor Ben Ainslie’s altercation in December with a media motorboat driver and a cameraman has brought into focus sailors’ difficulty in adapting to increased television coverage; after being disciplined, Ainslie was eventually cleared to continue his quest to join the ranks of the most decorated Olympic sailors ever.
lead_paragraph: Ben Ainslie’s altercation in December with a media motorboat driver and a cameraman has brought into focus sailors’ difficulty in adapting to increased television coverage.

headline.seo: Ainslie Altercation Highlights Sailors’ Struggle With Increased Media Coverage
headline.main: As Gold Medalist Found Out, More Coverage Is Mixed Blessing for Sailing
headline.print_headline: As Gold Medalist Found Out, More Coverage Is Mixed Blessing for Sailing
